title: 040: The boys share their insecurities
description: Up until now you have laughed and learned on MindPump. Now it is time to cry with us... What do Sal, Adam and Justin really think about their bodies? To take a look at their Instagram pages (especially Sal & Adam's) you would think these boys were born to preen. But this wasn't always so. In this episode they confess their body image insecurities as well as how they have overcome them.
